On Mar 15, 2007, at 6:36 PM, Kenneth Stanley wrote:

> By the way, at what audience or venue would you be targeting
> your article?

Audience: anyone who has read your papers, and wants to write their  
own NEAT implementation.  My idea is to gather all of the information  
needed to do a full, well-performing, implementation, and organize it  
into a single location.  I'm pretty picky about implementing things,  
and strive for simplicity and cleanliness.  I'm happy to collaborate  
on this - my goals are to help the community.  A collaborator would  
just need familiarity with LyX.

Venue: none other than posting it on my website.

--Steve
--Apple-Mail-4-329123469

Content-Type: text/html;
	charset=ISO-8859-1
